name: Jobs for Vets
description: Swords of Plowshares assists veterans in San Francisco with finding employment by offering the following services: Work with our employment specialists to 1. Help you get ready by: - Enroll in our program - Address barriers such as housing instability - Complete job readiness workshops - Identify job industries, careers, and trainings of interest - Complete free training & certification programs 2. Help with your job search: - Develop a new resume and cover letter - Conduct one-on-one job search

howToGetIt: Email us to schedule: info4vets@stp-sf.org The website https://www.swords-to-plowshares.org/contact Call for more information (415) 727-VETS (8387) You will be contacted within 48 hours after the application is completed: To Apply
